cookieConsent.title: We use cookies

meta.title: Privacy Policy | MindWell
meta.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal data

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we collect, use, and protect your data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: At MindWell, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding your data.

dataCollection.title: Data we collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of data:

account.title: Account information
account.description: Name, email, profile picture (via Google OAuth)

health.title: Mental health data
health.description: Mood, symptoms, journal, goals, activities that you voluntarily enter

usage.title: Usage data
usage.description: Pages visited, features used, interactions with AI

technical.title: Technical data
technical.description: IP address, browser type, operating system

items.personalization: Personalize your experience and AI insights
items.communication: Send you important notifications and communications
items.improvement: Analyze usage to improve the application
items.security: Detect and prevent fraud and abuse

dataSharing.title: Data sharing
dataSharing.content: We never sell your data. We share your data only in the following cases:

legal.title: Legal obligations
legal.description: If required by law or to protect our rights

consent.title: With your consent
consent.description: In any other case, only with your explicit authorization

dataSecurity.title: Data security
dataSecurity.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data: encryption in transit (HTTPS), encryption at rest for sensitive data, strict access controls, regular security audits.

yourRights.title: Your rights (GDPR)
yourRights.intro: You have the following rights regarding your data:

access.title: Right of access
access.description: Request a copy of your data

deletion.title: Right to erasure
deletion.description: Delete your account and all your data

portability.title: Right to portability
portability.description: Export your data in a standard format

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for site operation, functional cookies for your preferences, and analytics cookies (with your consent). See our Cookie Policy for more details.

changes.title: Changes to this policy
changes.content: We may modify this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes by email or via the application.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.content: For any questions about this policy or to exercise your rights, contact us at:

meta.title: Terms of Service | MindWell
meta.description: The terms governing the use of MindWell

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: The terms governing your use of MindWell

acceptance.title: Acceptance of terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using MindWell, you agree to be bound by these terms of service. If you do not accept these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: Service description
description.content: MindWell is a mental health and wellness tracking application that offers mood tracking, journaling, goal setting, and artificial intelligence assistance tools. Our service is designed as a wellness tool and does not constitute a medical or therapeutic service.

items.accuracy: Provide accurate and complete information during registration
items.security: Maintain the security of your account and password
items.responsibility: Be responsible for all activity on your account
items.notification: Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use

userContent.title: User content
userContent.intro: Regarding the content you create on MindWell:

items.ownership: You retain ownership of all content you create
items.license: You grant us a license to host and process your content to provide the service
items.responsibility: You are responsible for your content and must comply with applicable laws

items.illegal: Use the service for illegal or unauthorized purposes
items.harmful: Post offensive, defamatory, or harmful content
items.spam: Send spam or unsolicited commercial content
items.interference: Interfere with the operation of the service
items.automation: Use automated bots or scripts without authorization

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual property
intellectualProperty.content: MindWell and its original content (text, graphics, logos, code) are the property of MindWell and are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute our content without permission.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account at any time for violation of these terms. You can also close your account at any time from your settings.

disclaimers.title: Disclaimers
disclaimers.content: THE SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND. WE DO NOT GUARANTEE THAT THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE.

limitation.title: Limitation of liability
limitation.content: MindWell will not be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use the service.

modifications.title: Modifications to terms
modifications.content: We may modify these terms at any time. Modifications will take effect upon publication. Your continued use of the service after modifications constitutes your acceptance of the new terms.

governingLaw.title: Governing law
governingLaw.content: These terms are governed by French and European laws. Any dispute will be submitted to the competent courts of France.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about these terms, contact us at:

meta.title: Mental Health Disclaimer | MindWell
meta.description: Important information about using MindWell and service limitations

disclaimer.title: Mental Health Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Important information regarding the use of MindWell

alert.title: Important Warning
alert.description: MindWell is NOT a medical service. In case of emergency, immediately contact emergency services or a crisis line.

notMedicalAdvice.title: Not medical advice
notMedicalAdvice.content: MindWell is a wellness and personal tracking tool. Nothing in this application constitutes medical, psychological, or psychiatric advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Information and insights provided by AI are for informational purposes only and should not be considered professional medical advice.

noSubstitute.title: Not a substitute for professional help
noSubstitute.content: MindWell does not in any way replace consultation with a qualified mental health professional (psychologist, psychiatrist, therapist). If you suffer from mental health problems, always consult a healthcare professional.

aiLimitations.title: Artificial intelligence limitations
aiLimitations.intro: Our AI assistant has important limitations:

items.notTherapist: AI is not a therapist and cannot provide therapy
items.noEmergency: AI cannot handle emergencies or crises
items.limitations: AI may make mistakes or provide inaccurate information
items.noGuarantee: AI suggestions do not guarantee therapeutic results

emergencyResources.title: Emergency resources
emergencyResources.intro: If you are in distress or have suicidal thoughts, contact immediately:

crisis.title: Crisis lines
crisis.emergencyText: Call 15 (SAMU) or go to the nearest emergency room

seekProfessional.title: When to seek professional help
seekProfessional.intro: You should consult a mental health professional if:

items.severe: Your symptoms interfere with your daily life
items.harm: You have thoughts of self-harm or suicide
items.interference: You have difficulty functioning at work or in relationships

userResponsibility.title: User responsibility
userResponsibility.content: By using MindWell, you acknowledge and accept that you are solely responsible for your decisions regarding your mental health. MindWell provides tracking and reflection tools, but decisions about your treatment should be made in consultation with qualified healthcare professionals.

dataAccuracy.title: Data accuracy
dataAccuracy.content: Insights, trends, and analyses provided by MindWell are based on the data you enter. Their accuracy and usefulness depend on the quality and regularity of your entries. These analyses are personal reflection tools and not medical diagnoses.

noLiability.title: Limitation of liability
noLiability.content: MindWell and its creators cannot be held responsible for any decision made based on information or suggestions provided by the application. Always consult a healthcare professional before making important decisions about your mental health.

modifications.title: Modifications
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this disclaimer at any time. Modifications will be effective upon publication on this page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about this disclaimer, contact us at:

meta.title: Cookie Policy | MindWell
meta.description: How we use cookies and similar technologies

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: How we use cookies and similar technologies

whatAreCookies.title: What is a cookie?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us make our site work, improve your experience, and understand how you use our service.

howWeUse.title: How we use cookies
howWeUse.intro: We use cookies for various reasons detailed below.

essential.title: Essential cookies (required)
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the site to function and cannot be disabled:

items.authentication: Authentication cookies to maintain your session

functional.title: Functional cookies (optional)
functional.description: These cookies enhance your experience by remembering your choices:

analytics.title: Analytics cookies (optional)
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how you use the site:

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies
thirdParty.intro: We use certain third-party services that may place cookies:

auth.title: Google OAuth
auth.description: For authentication (required if you use Google Sign-In)

analytics.title: Analytics services
analytics.description: To measure usage (optional, with your consent)

control.title: Control cookies
control.intro: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

settings.title: Application settings
settings.description: Manage your cookie preferences in your settings

browser.title: Browser settings
browser.description: Configure your browser to block or delete cookies

optOut.title: Analytics opt-out
optOut.description: Disable analytics cookies in your preferences

control.note: Note that blocking certain cookies may affect site functionality.

retention.title: Retention period
retention.content: Session cookies are deleted when you close your browser. Persistent cookies are kept according to their specific duration (typically 30 days to 1 year).

updates.title: Updates to this policy
updates.content: We may update this cookie policy occasionally. We will inform you of any significant changes.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For questions about our use of cookies, contact us at:
